item.title: Hello World
item.description:
Hello World

Hi guys, this is my first blog post. I am using R Markdown to write this post. It is very nice to use!

You can embed an R code chunk like this:

print("Hello World!")
## [1] "Hello World!"

item.title: PhD work sharing
item.description:
I am a PhD student in the CARE Unit at Monash University. My research interests include machine learning, data mining, and Environmental Epidemiology. I am currently working on climate change related topics.

My email is zhihu.xu@monash.edu.
